00019 #ifndef SP_TEXTURED_QUAD_SG_H
00020 #define SP_TEXTURED_QUAD_SG_H
00021 
00022 #include "SpGlHeaders.h"
00023 #include "SpStreamGeometry.h"
00024 
00025 
00026 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00027 
00028 namespace Spark:
00029 {
00030 
00031 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00033 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00034 class SpTexturedQuadSg : public SpStreamGeometry
00035 {
00036 
00038 public:
00039 
00040     SpTexturedQuadSg(
00041         float fMinX = 0.0f, float fMinY = 0.0f,
00042         float fMaxX = 1.0f, float fMaxY = 1.0f, float fZ=0.5f
00043         float fMinS = 0.0f, float fMinT = 0.0f,
00044         float fMaxS = 1.0f, float fMaxT = 1.0f)
00045     ) :
00046         m_fMinX(fMinX), m_fMinY(fMinY),
00047         m_fMaxX(fMaxX), m_fMaxY(fMaxY), m_fZ(fZ),
00048         m_fMinS(fMinS), m_fMinT(fMinT),
00049         m_fMaxS(fMaxS), m_fMaxT(fMaxT)
00050     {
00051         // EMPTY!
00052     }
00053 
00054     virtual ~SpTexturedQuadSg()
00055     {
00056         // EMPTY!
00057     }
00058 
00060 public:
00061 
00062 
00063     virtual void render()
00064     {
00065         glNormal3f(m_fMinX, m_fMinY, 1.0f);
00066         glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00067         {
00068             glTexCoord2f(m_fMinS, m_fMinT); glVertex3f(m_fMinX, m_fMinY, m_fZ);
00069             glTexCoord2f(m_fMaxS, m_fMinT); glVertex3f(m_fMaxX, m_fMinY, m_fZ);
00070             glTexCoord2f(m_fMaxS, m_fMaxT); glVertex3f(m_fMaxX, m_fMaxY, m_fZ);
00071             glTexCoord2f(m_fMinS, m_fMaxT); glVertex3f(m_fMinX, m_fMaxY, m_fZ);
00072         }
00073         glEnd();
00074     }
00075 
00076     inline void setVertexCoordRect(
00077         float fMinX, float fMinY, float fMaxX, float fMaxY, float fZ = 0.5f)
00078     {
00079         m_fMinX = fMinX; m_fMaxX = fMaxX;
00080         m_fMinY = fMinY; m_fMaxY = fMaxY;
00081         m_fZ = fZ;
00082     }
00083 
00084     inline void setTexCoordRect(
00085         float fMinS, float fMinT, float fMaxS, float fMaxT)
00086     {
00087         m_fMinS = fMinS; m_fMaxS = fMaxS;
00088         m_fMinT = fMinT; m_fMaxT = fMaxT;
00089     }
00090 
00091 protected:
00092 
00093     float m_fMinX;
00094     float m_fMinY;
00095     float m_fMaxX;
00096     float m_fMaxY;
00097 
00098     float m_fZ;
00099 
00100     float m_fMinS;
00101     float m_fMaxS;
00102     float m_fMinT;
00103     float m_fMaxT;
00104 
00105 };
00106 
00107 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00108 
00109 }   // end namespace: Spark

00111 #endif
